/* REFERENCE FOR CHESS HOT ENCODING STUFF */
00000000000000000000000000000001 White Queen Rook     = 0x00000001
00000000000000000000000000000010 White Queen Knight   = 0x00000002	
00000000000000000000000000000100 White Queen Bishop   = 0x00000004
00000000000000000000000000001000 White Queen          = 0x00000008
00000000000000000000000000010000 White King           = 0x00000010
00000000000000000000000000100000 White King Bishop    = 0x00000020
00000000000000000000000001000000 White King Knight    = 0x00000040
00000000000000000000000010000000 White king Rook      = 0x00000080
00000000000000000000000100000000 White Pawn 1         = 0x00000100
00000000000000000000001000000000 White Pawn 2         = 0x00000200
00000000000000000000010000000000 White Pawn 3         = 0x00000400
00000000000000000000100000000000 White Pawn 4         = 0x00000800
00000000000000000001000000000000 White Pawn 5         = 0x00001000
00000000000000000010000000000000 White Pawn 6         = 0x00002000
00000000000000000100000000000000 White Pawn 7         = 0x00004000
00000000000000001000000000000000 White Pawn 8         = 0x00008000
00000000000000010000000000000000 Black Queen Rook     = 0x00010000
00000000000000100000000000000000 Black Queen Knight   = 0x00020000
00000000000001000000000000000000 Black Queen Bishop   = 0x00040000
00000000000010000000000000000000 Black Queen          = 0x00080000
00000000000100000000000000000000 Black King           = 0x00100000
00000000001000000000000000000000 Black King Bishop    = 0x00200000
00000000010000000000000000000000 Black King Knight    = 0x00400000
00000000100000000000000000000000 Black King Rook      = 0x00800000
00000001000000000000000000000000 Black Pawn 1         = 0x01000000
00000010000000000000000000000000 Black Pawn 2         = 0x02000000
00000100000000000000000000000000 Black Pawn 3         = 0x04000000
00001000000000000000000000000000 Black Pawn 4         = 0x08000000
00010000000000000000000000000000 Black Pawn 5         = 0x10000000
00100000000000000000000000000000 Black Pawn 6         = 0x20000000
01000000000000000000000000000000 Black Pawn 7         = 0x40000000
10000000000000000000000000000000 Black Pawn 8         = 0x80000000
